pages.text: 44|3|hananim-eun geugeos-eul chugbogbad-eun bam-e gyesihaessnani geugeos-eulo gyeong-goha goja ham-ila
44|4|geunal bam modeun jiheloun ildeul i myeongbaeghayeojini
44|6|geugeos-eun junim-eulobuteoui jabi la sillo hananim-eun deul-eusigo asi neun bun-isila
44|7|neohuiga hwagsilhan mid-eum-eul gajil ttae geubun-eun haneulgwa daeji geuligo geusaie issneun manmul-ui junim-isila
44|8|geubun oeeneun sin-i eobs-eumyeo saeng myeong-eul jusigo saengmyeong-eul as-a gasineun bundo geubun-eulo neohuiui junim-iyo ttohan neohui josang-ui junim-isila
44|10|haneul-i jit-eun yeongilo gadeug chaneun geunal-eul geudaeneun jikyeobolila
44|11|yeongiga salamdeul-eul deop-eo gali uni gotongseuleoun beol-ila
44|12|bulsinjadeul-eun juyeo jeohuiege i beol-eul geodueo jusoseo jeohuiga mid gessnaida
44|13|geu gyohun-i geudeul-ege yuyongha gessneunyo jinlileul balghyeojuneun seonjijaga geudeul-ege imi imhasyeossdoda
44|14|geuleona geudeul-eun geulobuteo deung eul dollimyeo geuga michinjala malhadeo la
44|15|hananimkkeseo jamsi eungbeol-eul geo dueo jumyeon neohuineun dasi saagham-eu lo dol-agal geos-ila
44|16|gajang gyeoglyeolhan eungbeol-i iss-eul geunal hananim-eun gotongseuleoon beol-eul ga halila
44|17|hananim-eun geudeul ijeon-ui pala o baegseong-eul siheomhayeoss-euni hullyunghan seonjijaga geudeul-ege imhayeo
44|18|hananim-ui jongdeul-eul naege neomgyeo juo sillo naneun neohuiege on mid-eum ui seonjijala malhadeola
